story.kicker_image_caption: GGSIPU hiring: Apply now for various Teaching posts
story.storykicker: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprashta University (GGSIPU) has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for teaching posts at various departments.
story.storybody:
Guru Gobind Singh Indraprashta University (GGSIPU) has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for teaching posts at various departments.

All the candidates are requested to apply through a prescribed format on or before June 30, 2016.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 36

Name of the post:

Professor: 3

Associate Professor: 16

Assistant Professor: 17

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

University School of Humanities and Social Science:

Professor: All the candidates interested in applying for this post need to have a degree in the Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD) and Master degree in relevant discipline with 10 years of experience in teaching, research and/or industry.

For the post of Associate Professor, the candidates should also have an eight years of experience in related field.

University School of Architecture and Planning:    

Professor:  All the candidates need to have a graduate degree/master degree/ Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD) in Architecture with 13 years of experience in teaching.

For the post of Assistant Professor, the candidate should have a graduate degree/master degree in architecture.

For more details on eligibility criteria, all the candidates are advised to check the official notification available on university's website.

Selection procedure:

The selection of candidates will be done on the basis of an interview or a written test.

Application fee:

All the candidates from the general category need to pay Rs 500 for each application form. However, the candidates from the reserved category are exempted from paying fee.

How to apply:

  • The candidates can download the application from the website, www.ipu.ac.in
  • Click on the tab, "Events and Notices"
  • Click on relevant link
  • Along with application form, candidates need to attach photocopy of educational and experience certificates
  • The complete application should reach the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, Sector-16 C, Dwarka New Delhi - 110078.

Important dates:

The last date to apply is June 30.

Read: Punjab Police is hiring for 7416 posts, apply before June 21

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
